column1: #Text=The " Wikipedian in Residence " position falls within the Archives ' social media staff within the Open Government division of Information Services , since the institution 's goal is to distribute as much content to the widest audience possible .

column1: #Text=The internship is 40 hours per week from mid-May to late August .
#Text=The Archivist of the United States , David Ferriero , has been very supportive of Wikipedia .
#Text=He is shown here welcoming Wikipedians to the Archives to celebrate the project 's tenth birthday .
#Text=( ( Wikinews ) ) Before you started your internship , how close of a relationship did the National Archives have with Wikipedia ?
#Text=There was no official relationship , however the National Archives has long been supportive of Wikipedia .
#Text=Earlier this year , for instance , the National Archives hosted a meetup in the main DC location in honor of Wikipedia 's tenth anniversary .
#Text=The Archivist of the United States , David Ferriero , is incredibly friendly to Wikipedia , as are many of the National Archives ' staff .
#Text=As he wrote after WikiXDC , " As an agency , I look forward to our staff learning more about the fabric and culture of Wikipedia and how to get involved .
